thread.title: Loaves and Fishes, Veterans Services partner for 5K Run for Recovery, race set for Saturday
thread.title_full: Loaves and Fishes, Veterans Services partner for 5K Run for Recovery, race set for Saturday

author: MACEO DONALD NEWS-TIMES
title: Loaves and Fishes, Veterans Services partner for 5K Run for Recovery, race set for Saturday
text:
BEAUFORT — With addiction and homelessness at concerning levels in many parts of the country, two non-profit organizations are working together to make a difference.
Loaves and Fishes of Beaufort and the Veterans Services of the Carolinas (VSC) are partnering to put on a 5K Run for Recovery on Saturday at 8 a.m. in downtown Beaufort.
